doc.cdescr: THE BRAKE LIGHT SHOULD BE EXTENDED TO PASSAT MODELS (OURS IS 1999).   WE HAVE HAD THE BRAKE LIGHT STAYING ON, TRIGGERING THE ABS LIGHT TO COME ON ALSO. AFTER 3 ACE MECHANICS REVIEW THE PROBLEM, THEY ISOLATED IT TO THE SAME PROBLEM THAN THE RECALL FROM VOLKSWAGEN ANNOUNCED TODAY. THIS PROBLEM WAS ACTUALLY IDENTIFIED MORE THAN 3 MONTHS AGO AND WE DON'T KNOW IF A BRAKE PROBLEM OCCURRED HOW IT WILL SHOW SINCE THE LIGHT IS ALWAYS ON.   *JB
